arv26:38: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrvaṁ dṛḍha-samādānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:40: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ tatra pūrve vicitra-dānopacayena nirvṛttam ||
arv26:42: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve para-sattvājihma-karaṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:44: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve sattvānāṁ Dharma-rakṣāvaraṇa-gupti-karaṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:46: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve paraparivārābhedanatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:48: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve vividha-prāvaraṇānupradānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:50: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve vipulānnapānānupradānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:52: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve Buddha-dharma-parigrahaṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:54: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve guhya-mantra-rakṣaṇatayā | maithuna-dharma-prativisarjanatayā ca nirvṛttam ||
arv26:56: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve subha-karmānupūrvācaraṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:58: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve kuśala-dharma-samācaraṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:60: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve pareṣām-abhayāśvāsadānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:62: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve parakiṅkaraṇīyotsukatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:64: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve daśa-kuśala-karma-pathātapta-samādānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:66: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve glāneṣu vividha-bhaiṣajyānupradānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:68: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve kuśala-mūla-prayoga-paripūryā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:70: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve sarva-sattvāśvāsa-prayogatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:72: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve bhinna-sattva-sandhānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:74: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve svārakṣita-kāya-vāṅ-manas-karmatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:76: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve satya-vacana-saṁrakṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:78: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve ’pramāṇa-puṇya-skandho(pasevitā)tmatayā parānupradānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:80: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve snigdha-vacana-satya-pālanatayā ānanda-vacana-śrāvaṇatayā ca nirvṛttam ||
arv26:82: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve maitravat sattva-saṁrakṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:86: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve Dharma-saṁgīti-citta-karmaṇyatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:90: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve saṁgaṇikā-parivarjanatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:94: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve sarva-prāṇānukampanatayā nihita-loṣṭa-daṇḍa-śastratayā ca nirvṛttam ||
arv26:96: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve varṇārhānāṁ varṇa-bhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:98: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve guru-gaurava-praṇāmatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:100: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve ātmanaḥ para-sattvānāṁ ca samādhau niyojanatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:101: Apramāṇaiḥ kuśala-mūlaireśu dharmeṣu vaśavartitvāt Tathāgatasya dvā-triṁśan-mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇāni kāye nirvṛttāni ||
